name: Industrial Revolution: Saboteur
description:
Industrial Revolution : Saboteur is an game entry for the Historically Accurate Game 6 of 2023.

It is focused around the Luddites who were a group of textile artisans that fought against the factories during the Industrial Revolution.

There are three quests in the game. 

1) Putting up pamphlets around the various levels.

2) Recurring others to your cause

3) Planting bombs in the factors that house the textile machines (this is made up!  The Luddites did destroy textile machines, but they smashed them).

It is a first person game.  WASD to move around, E to interact, space to jump, left shift to sprint and P to open up the quest menu.

I'm 100% sure there are bugs!

This is made with Unreal, so it is a downloadable game.

Thanks!
